api.models module

class api.models.HydroponicSystem(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Model representing a hydroponic system owned by a user. Each system is uniquely associated with a user.

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

measurements

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class api.models.Measurement(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Model representing a measurement recorded for a hydroponic system. Each measurement contains pH, temperature, and TDS (Total Dissolved Solids).

groups

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

Bases: PageNumberPagination

api.tests module

class api.tests.HydroponicSystemAPITestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for API endpoints related to hydroponic system management.

setUp()[source]

Prepares test data: - Creates a test user and authenticates them. - Creates a hydroponic system for the user. - Stores the API endpoint for easy access.

test_create_system()[source]

Test creating a new hydroponic system.

test_delete_system()[source]

Test deleting a hydroponic system.

test_get_ordered_systems_list()[source]

Test retrieving systems ordered by creation date.

test_get_sorted_systems_list()[source]

Test filtering systems by creation date range.

test_get_system_detail()[source]

Test retrieving details of a specific hydroponic system.

test_get_system_list()[source]

Test retrieving a list of hydroponic systems owned by the authenticated user.

test_unauthorized_user_create_system()[source]

Test that an unauthorized user cannot create a hydroponic system.

test_update_system()[source]

Test updating a hydroponic system using PUT.

class api.tests.MeasurementAPITestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for API endpoints related to measurement management in hydroponic systems.

setUp()[source]

Prepares test data: - Creates a user and authenticates them. - Creates a hydroponic system for the user. - Creates an initial measurement. - Stores API URLs for easy access.

test_create_measurement()[source]

Test creating a new measurement.

test_delete_measurement()[source]

Test deleting a measurement.

test_get_measurement_detail()[source]

Test retrieving a specific measurement by its ID.

test_get_measurement_list()[source]

Test retrieving a paginated list of measurements for a specific system.

test_get_measurement_ordered_list()[source]

Test retrieving a list of measurements ordered by pH.

test_get_measurement_sorted_list()[source]

Test filtering and sorting of measurements using query parameters.

test_partial_update_measurement()[source]

Test partially updating a measurement using PATCH.

test_unauthorized_user_create_measurement()[source]

Test that an unauthorized user cannot create a measurement.

test_update_measurement()[source]

Test updating an existing measurement using PUT.

test_user_cannot_edit_other_user_measurement()[source]

Test that a user cannot edit a measurement from another user’s system.

api.urls module

api.views module

class api.views.HydroponicsSystemView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: APIView

API endpoint for managing hydroponic systems. Supports filtering and sorting. Paginacja is disabled for system lists.

delete(request, pk)[source]

Deletes a hydroponic system. The authenticated user must be the owner.

filter_backends = [<class 'rest_framework.filters.OrderingFilter'>, <class 'django_filters.rest_framework.backends.DjangoFilterBackend'>]
filterset_class

alias of HydroponicSystemFilter

get(request, pk=None)[source]

Retrieves hydroponic systems: - If pk is provided, returns details of a single system with the last 10 measurements. - Otherwise, returns a list of all systems owned by the user.

get_queryset(user)[source]

Returns a queryset of hydroponic systems owned by the authenticated user. Uses order_by() for default sorting.

ordering = 'created_date'
ordering_fields = ['name', 'created_date']
patch(request, pk)[source]

Partially updates an existing hydroponic system. The authenticated user must be the owner.

permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.IsAuthenticated'>]
post(request)[source]

Creates a new hydroponic system and assigns the authenticated user as the owner.

put(request, pk)[source]

Updates an existing hydroponic system. The authenticated user must be the owner.

class api.views.MeasurementView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: APIView

API endpoint for managing measurements in a hydroponic system.

Supported HTTP methods: - GET: Retrieve one or all measurements with pagination. - POST: Create a new measurement. - PUT/PATCH: Update a specific measurement. - DELETE: Delete a specific measurement.

delete(request, system_id, measurement_id)[source]

Delete a specific measurement.

filter_backends = [<class 'rest_framework.filters.OrderingFilter'>, <class 'django_filters.rest_framework.backends.DjangoFilterBackend'>]
filterset_class

alias of MeasurementFilter

get(request, system_id, measurement_id=None)[source]

Retrieve measurements. - If measurement_id is provided, returns a single measurement. - Otherwise, returns a paginated list of all measurements for the system.

get_queryset(system_id)[source]

Returns a queryset of measurements that belong to a system owned by the authenticated user.

get_system(system_id)[source]

Returns the HydroponicSystem if it belongs to the authenticated user, otherwise raises 404.

ordering = ['timestamp']
ordering_fields = ['ph', 'temperature', 'tds', 'timestamp']
pagination_class

alias of MeasurementPagination

patch(request, system_id, measurement_id)[source]

Partially update a specific measurement.

permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.IsAuthenticated'>]
post(request, system_id)[source]

Create a new measurement in the specified system.

put(request, system_id, measurement_id)[source]

Fully update a specific measurement.

class api.views.RegisterView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: APIView

API endpoint for user registration. Allows anyone to register a new account. Returns the created user along with JWT tokens.

permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.AllowAny'>]
post(request)[source]

Handles user registration. - Validates user input. - Creates a new user. - Returns the user data along with JWT tokens.

class api.views.UserView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: APIView

API endpoint for retrieving user data. Allows only authenticated users to access user details.

get(request, user_id=None)[source]

Retrieves user information. - If user_id is provided, returns details of a specific user. - Otherwise, returns a list of all users.

permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.IsAuthenticated'>]
